'''1.2.14''' is a hotfix for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released exclusively to iOS devices. The update removed the developer commands that were accidentally introduced in 1.2.13.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167311-Minecraft-1-2-14-iOS-Only-|title=Minecraft - 1.2.14 (iOS Only)}}</ref> It is compatible with 1.2.13 servers. Although two beta versions ([[Bedrock Edition beta 1.2.14.2|1.2.14.2]] and [[Bedrock Edition beta 1.2.14.3|1.2.14.3]]) were released under the same name as this version, they were actually for 1.4.0.

== Changes ==
* Removed the debug commands that were accidentally included in the previous update.
